document.full_text: "glee" and "modern family" tied for best tv comedy series at the annual glaad awards on sunday, as the campaign group honored shows and stars for advancing the portrayal of gays and lesbians in the media.
document.title: "glee" and "modern family" honored by gay group
lines_and_colors: "glee" and "modern family" tied for best tv comedy series at the annual glaad awards on sunday, as the campaign group honored shows and stars for advancing the portrayal of gays and lesbians in the media.
